about_the_game:
The first Steam Playtest  demo is now open!  Let's create the game together!

In the game, you have a complete backpack that can be purchased with various props (equipment, accessories, moves, etc.) to create a powerful genre that belongs exclusively to you. The combination of specific props can merge to form some special props that cannot be purchased from the store. The attributes of props and moves will be the key factors determining whether you can win battles.

You can use props to bring different buff stacks to your moves. Make the genre more diverse, such as critical strike, damage, speed, blocking etc;

In addition, the connection between moves will also form a combination of moves, which can achieve continuous output after disrupting the opponent's posture. By purchasing enchanting props, additional attribute bonuses can also be achieved for moves. For example: burning, frost, corrosion, dizziness etc;

Finally, I hope that after you have made a deep strategic deployment, you can still watch a thrilling battle with blood pumping blood.

The game is still under development and I hope to meet everyone soon!

The warrior's life has come to an end, and you are about to face the judgment of God.

Nine battles determine the ultimate meaning of one's life.

Desire, arrogance, cunning, laziness, vanity, anger, cowardice, paranoia, fear

Recalling the life of a warrior, recounting to the gods the victories and losses of these nine battles.

Those who are defeated by desires are trapped in material and emotional desires;

Defeated by the arrogant, lost in the expansion of oneself

Memories of a life full of battles, how would you describe these nine battles?

name: Wretch: Divine Ascent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10& Windows11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X OR i5-11600K and equivalent or higher-level processors
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1630 or AMD RX 560 and equivalent or higher-level graphics processors
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Wretch: Divine Ascent is a dark fantasy style 1v1 auto chess game inspired by "Backpack Battles" and developed using the UE engine. Players need to set up their character's combat skills before the battle, purchase equipment and items, and formulate battle strategies.
